title: Protect your email with Mail Backup X — now just $40 for Labor Day
description:
For most professionals, email is one of your most valuable resources. Losing access to your account or misplacing emails can cause a serious headache, or even real professional problems. Fortunately, this Labor Day, you can invest in your email’s security with Mail Backup X Individual Edition, available for a special discount now through 9/4 during our Labor Day Sale.

Mail Backup X has earned high praise across the web, with 4.5/5 stars on G2 and 4.8/5 stars on AppSumo. That’s because it’s a one-stop solution for mail backup, archiving, email management, and mail conversion, giving you complete control of your email security. You can backup from all major mail clients and services, quickly search and view your emails from your archives, and organize your emails in highly compressed archives with 100% privacy thanks to military-grade encryption.

Better email management starts with Mail Backup X. Get an Individual Edition for 77% off $179 at just $39.97 now through 11:59pm PST on 9/4.

 

Mail Backup X Individual Edition – $39.97
